title: Oxon Cove  Park & Oxon Hill Farm: Accessibility
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Accessibility             Accessibility         The Mount Welby historic house is accessible to visitors with wheelchairs. NPS photo by Jamie Euken  If you or someone in your group is in a wheelchair or has other mobility or special needs, please call the park before your visit at 301-839-0503 so that we can make sure to accommodate these needs as best as possible. Access Pass While Oxon Cove Park does not charge an entrance fee, some National Park Service sites do. The Access Pass allows free entrance to federal fee areas for persons with permanent disabilities and can also be shown for some discounts on services. The pass is free for citizens or permanent residents of the U.S. who present documentation (such as from a licensed physician, the Veteran's Administration, or a vocational rehabilitation agency) of a permanent medical disability. For more information on the Access Pass, please visit http://store.usgs.gov/pass/access.html.
